alert.note: Alert for Amelia; Brunswick; Chesterfield; City of Colonial Heights; City of Petersburg; Dinwiddie; Nottoway (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued January 09 at 7:05PM EST until January 09 at 10:15PM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Southeastern Amelia County in central Virginia... South Central Chesterfield County in central Virginia... The City of Colonial Heights in central Virginia... Northern Brunswick County in south central Virginia... Dinwiddie County in south central Virginia... Southeastern Nottoway County in south central Virginia... The Western City of Petersburg in south central Virginia... * Until 1015 PM EST. * At 705 PM EST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 2 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Petersburg, Dinwiddie, Colonial Heights, Lawrenceville, McKenney, Virginia State University, Alberta, Dewitt, Sutherland, Fort Barfoot, Matoaca, Ettrick, Rocky Run, Butterworth, Ford, Center Star, Walkers, Darvills, Rawlings and Hebron. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Move to higher ground now. Act quickly to protect your life. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.

area.areaDesc: Amelia; Brunswick; Chesterfield; City of Colonial Heights; City of Petersburg; Dinwiddie; Nottoway
